document_data.mainbody:
usty Halidom was a nightclub in the city of Waterdeep in the 12 century DR and was among the citys first nightclubs.
This nightclub was situated on the corner of the northern entrance to Anchorets Court, in Waterdeeps Southern Ward, on the site that would later hold the home of Kappiyan Flurmastyr.
On one night, prior to the 14 century DR, two inebriated wizards got into a magic fight and ended up destroying the Rusty Halidom. All the dancers, guests, and wine that were inside the nightclub at the time were lost.
In the years following the Rusty Halidoms destruction, rumors persisted that treasure was lost in the wreckage and was later paved over.
